locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Pleasant Loves experience. One of the best I‚Äôve been to so far. Showers were well maintained. Not the biggest shower, but plenty enough space for two people to shower and get changed. Pleasant staff as well.
‚Ä¶ But... There are only 5 showers and only 1 handicapped that does NOT have a shower wand. Sure it's bigger and they are nice. But shower wands are DESPERATELY NEEDED.
If your system is updating nothing wrong with us. All other loves travel stop will provide the shower that's what i have seen.

Hot food

Good gas price

Some essential auto parts

Clean shower, 15 dollar per use
Nice presentation for the Shower first time in two years. I don‚Äôt know who is the rep, it‚Äôs on Oct 3 rd early morning by 2.30 AM

These people do not clean the showers! They run in flush toilets barely put towels in there and lock the door and ring for the next one. I‚Äôm sorry, didn‚Äôt the whole country get shut down due to Covid! Management needs to make sure things ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ say Hi Welcome to Loves.  That didn't happen here. Folks were trying to convince us NOT TO SHOWER.  MY husband went in and out the door several times and not once did he feel the Love from this Loves. He finally said something to this ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ at you from across the store  "Welcome in" .....I'm in at least 1 to 3 different Loves on any given day, for food, fuel, shower bathrooms or drinks ...this gets very annoying. Hire enough people to keep an eye out for shoplifters if that's ‚Ä¶

There store was dirty , I had to what over 1.5 hrs for a shower because they where not getting cleaned . When the night guy went to " clean " the shower for me to use , all that was done was new towels where put in . The toilet was dirty ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Parking is ok if you get there early. Carl's Jr is pitifully slow. The shower had the usual missing hooks. When will they figure out that most people now use body wash and that those little trays are useless? A real shelf would be nice.

locations.title: TA Express Travel Center
locations.content: TA Express Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Best service ever in my career. Rick and John are great in the shop. Lot of bays they have and very quick service and they are proffessional.I went to fuel desk. App and kiosk not working to take shower. They gave me free shower.

‚Ä¶ The restroom where closed.  With a line of people waiting.   They got rude and told me they will not open a shower so we could use the rest room. When I went to pay for diesel at the pumps card reader didn't work.   Had to go back in ‚Ä¶

This place is the definition of unreliable. Yes the place is clean and the showers are nice when they work. They Always have electric or internet problems. This means if you stay here as a truck driver you may or may not get a shower and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ mechanic WAS AMAZING, KIND AND VERY EFFICIENT. Ann at the front desk was  so nice and professional. They comped me a shower while my truck was in the shop. Jeff went above and beyond the call of duty. I haven't been totaled up for the bill ‚Ä¶

Nichole was so RUDE! We got 462 dollars worth of fuel and we didn't get shower credits we asked Nichole to help us she said it would be on our card tomorrow! We told her we wanted a shower today her response was NOT MY PROBLEM.Nichole needs ‚Ä¶
The cleanest shower off the interstate highway. Very friendly employees. And no wait shower times. Kudos to all employees for the very hard work you all do.
The bathroom had used toilet paper just laying in the stalls and trash was overflowing everywhere. First time i ever  had to use my shower credit just to use the toilet.
Cleanest place to shower and clean clothes. Its an oasis from the poorly run other truck stops.
Good place to shower & get cleaned up, rested & get back on the road.
Very nice ta clean shower subway and taco Bell

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ like a normal gas station. But this place was a great place for us. The best gas price, the best customer service, the best bathrooms and the best place to take a shower too if you want to! Thank you so much for your great service guysüôè ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The showers are so tiny. It‚Äôs uncomfortable and water splashes everywhere out of the shower. The cold air hits you while you‚Äôre trying to be under the warm water. Every time the toilet flushes in one of the other two showers, it affects ‚Ä¶

Management should work on shower cleaning on time I booked a shower staff was talking with each other nobody was cleaning shower . All showers were free for cleaning but they were wasting time of customers.  Management should teach them ‚Ä¶
The B√ºrger King here is pretty good but the wait for a shower here is INSANE. It doesn't take an hour to clean a shower unless your people are drunk or cleaning it all with a single toothbrush.

They play around too much.  Nobody was willing to clean the showers.  I tried to complain, but they just brushed me off.  Even though I was next in line for a shower, I couldn't wait any longer,  I had to ask for my shower credit back.
Almost two hours to get a shower. Come to find out the janitor also do DoorDash. Go somewhere else,shower is a closet
Staff was friendly,  showers were clean .  First pilot I've seen give soap bars and have air fresheners in the shower area. Not too busy or crowded. 3 showers on site .  üëç ‚Ä¶

There are only 3 showers and they don't reserve showers off of the app. There are 2 showers available right now and no one has given me a key yet. Been waiting for 45 mins. This is horrible service. If you need to shower I would keep ‚Ä¶
A nice place to park for the night. If your needing a shower this isn't the best place to stop they only have 3 showers. The staff is pretty good they are always friendly when I stop here.

the staff was AMAZING! NOT only did I shower in a clean room.. BUT, they let me shower my dog with me!!!
I sang every song in that shower I knew!!
THANK YOU

showerReviews.reviewText: FANTASTIC SHOWERS! We really just came for the showers here, and what a nice surprise! I love visiting the smaller truck stops when we travel just for the experience, and I really loved JR'S. Big, beautiful shower rooms with hard core water ‚Ä¶
I come to do laundry and (hopefully) get a shower. ‚Ä¶

Great showers
Also Non of your  business how many girls I have in the shower

This was our first time doing a truck stop shower. We have been camping every night and my wife needed to shower. We all ended up showering me, my self and our son. It was $7. This place was very clean, staff were so nice and will ‚Ä¶
Great place to catch a shower. Quiet place, the people are nice.
Shower towels are old, tattered, and smell horrible  when wet. They only cost $10, so bring your own towels.
